post:
SWISSMADE.HOST is a privacy-focused Switzerland-based cloud servers provider that is located both legally and physically in the country that is renowned for its strict laws and regulations on privacy and data protection. We host our servers and network equipment at an ultra-secure carbon-neutral Interxion™ data-center in Zurich, Switzerland.

SWISSMADE.HOST offers both preconfigured and custom Cloud hosting plans, that can be tailored to your demands and fit virtually any task while keeping your budget reasonable. SMH's Cloud platform allows to add and remove resources on the fly and pay only for the resource pool that is currently in use.

WHY SWISSMADE.HOST?

- data & privacy protection at state, policy and infrastructure levels
- ultra-secure data storage and processing facility in Zurich, Switzerland
- VMware® ESXi bare metal hypervisors with self-healing architecture
- high-availability & business continuity hosting platform with no single point of failure
- all-flash SSD storage arrays by SolidFire®
- easily scalable platform - add/remove resource with just a few clicks
- premium networking & SLA-guaranteed 99.9% uptime
- high-capacity DDoS protection and mitigation solution included with your order free of charge
- green data center with zero carbon footprint
- enterprise-class hardware by Supermicro®
- 24/7/365 Live support
- compliance with ITILv3, ISO 27001, ISO 22301, FINMA circular 07/8

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Data Protection & Business continuity

Switzerland is renowned for its strict laws and regulations on privacy and data protection, there's hardly any other country in the world with a matching grade of privacy protection at the political level. Not only your data and privacy are protected by Swiss laws, but we also take weighty efforts to secure it at the infrastructure level. Our data center in Zürich is practically a fortress: 24x7 CCTV surveillance, perimeter and inner premises security patrols, multi-layered access barriers, including mantraps and biometric readers. Zürich data center is fully compliant with business continuity ISO 27001 and ISO 22301 certifications.


Swiss Approach

At SWISSMADE.HOST, we are proud to be a Zurich-based web hosting company that shares the most distinct features that Switzerland is renowned for. We guarantee that your orders and requests will be processed in accordance with our company's strict privacy, data protection, customer orientation and quality assurance policies.

Payment Methods

We accept a wide range of payment methods including Credit/Debit cards, PayPal, Bank transfer, Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Dash and many others.

--

Thank you for your interest in secure Cloud platform offerings by SWISSMADE.HOST. Should you have any further questions, please ask by replying to this thread or contact us directly.

SMH TEAM
